alternative-isometric-perspective.settin: Toggle whether the isometric perspective is applied to the canvas.
Toggle whether token sprites adjust their position to reflect their elevation.
Displays a circular shadow and a vertical red line to indicate token elevation. Requires 'Enable Height Adjustment' to be active.
(BETA FEATURE. USE WITH CAUTION) Adjusts the visibility of tiles dynamically with the positioning of tokens. See how this feature works here.
(BETA FEATURE. USE WITH CAUTION. V12+ ONLY) Automatically adjusts the tokens sort property value when moving it around the canvas.

(BETA FEATURE WITH PERFORMANCE ISSUES. USE SPARENTLY) Creates a shadow effect on the token when behind a tile. GPU mode isn't working properly, but it is lightning fast. CPU is always heavy in processing, but a higher chunk option is faster trading quality fidelity. 'Chunk Size = 2' is the probably the better mode.
Displays a window with module information when starting Foundry VTT.
alternative-isometric-perspective.keybin: Increases the opacity of always visible tiles linked with walls.
Decreases the opacity of always visible tiles linked with walls.
alternative-isometric-perspective.scene_: Apply isometric transformation to the background image.
Adjust scale of art in isometric mode (Range: 0.5x to 3x). The "Offset Background (Pixels)" in
Grid tab can be used to shift/move the background.
Choose an isometric projection type for this scene.
alternative-isometric-perspective.custom: Enter the values of a custom isometric projection obtained from the app website.
alternative-isometric-perspective.token_: Disable isometric transformation on this token.
Offset the token art position in pixels.
Hold and drag to fine-tune X and Y
Change the anchor of the token. If 'Save?' is unchecked, doesn't apply the new anchor configuration.
Click to reset the token alignment configuration
Adjust scale of token art when in isometric perspective (0.01x to 3x).
If checked, this token will not auto-resize his art when its dimensions change.
alternative-isometric-perspective.tile_e: Disable isometric transformation on this tile.
alternative-isometric-perspective.tile_a: Offset the tile art position in pixels.
Hold and drag to fine-tune X and Y
alternative-isometric-perspective.tile_s: Adjust scale of tile art when in isometric perspective (0.01x to 3x).
alternative-isometric-perspective.tile_f: Flip the tile art horizontally. Works only with isometric transformation on.
alternative-isometric-perspective.tile_o: If checked, this tile will hide tokens with a shadow effect.
alternative-isometric-perspective.tile_l: Click the button to select a wall. This wall will be used to determine the tile's visibility with a selected token.
